website_summaries.verdict: Unique modular approach to shoe organization and storage. Perfect for large families or individuals with a collection of footwear.
pros: We love how the included plastic cubes create many organizational possibilities
Easy to divide and categorize the shoes by person, type, color, and more
cons: Shoe bins make it difficult to organize shoes of different sizes

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. You definitely need to make sure you push ever piece down but if you do, it'll be amazing!!! And I have room to add more shoes!!! 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Meredith King

customer_reviews.title: Less clutter and easy access
customer_reviews.text: Looks so much nicer in our closet than the shoe rack we had previously. One compartment can easily hold 4, sometimes 5, pairs of flats or 3-4 pairs of heels. We also use the top ones for shirts. The flexibility to stack them how you want is awesome. This took about 45 min to put together and I was diligent in hearing the snap of the panel in the connector before I moved on to the next piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This cabin was especially fun to put together. As you can tell, I did not use the same pattern that the manufacturers suggested. That’s because, I wanted to go tall and not wide. I already purchased the other cabinet by the manufacture and I had spare parts left over. So after modifying this cabinet and going up instead of wide, I took all my spare parts and made a little bitty cabinet for my slippers and my lunch bag. I also use zip ties on four places for each joint.
customer_reviews.author: oribhabor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe storage for a walk-in closet.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased overall. Assembly was a bit tricky before I got the hang of it. There is a video on Amazon that is helpful (the instructions that came with the product were NOT helpful). The material is a little delicate, so be cautious while assembling (I accidentally got a little tear in a side panel when I was not careful). It fits beautifully in my closet. I left the top row open for my boots and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra K

customer_reviews.title: Great storage containers...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for storage inside or outside of a closet. Super easy to put together, I watched the video that a lady posted because I had already heard so many complaints from the reviews. Once you understand how to put it together it literally takes 5-10 minutes to put together the whole thing. Study and lightweight just don't stack anything on top of it and you're good.Kids were able to organize their shoes and other items in their closet no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brotha Dave

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensively cleans up our shoe mess
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. I read the reviews about cheap construction and difficulty with assembly but ordered it anyway and I am well pleased. For the price you can't expect California Closet design or construction. I have it in my garage and it's a great way to keep our plethora of shoes neatly stored. It's flexible in the way it can be put together so there are several configurations possible. The doors are flimsy and may not withstand rough usage (read children) but we have not had a problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived as scheduled and was tightly packed with the parts required to assemble the storage boxes. Instructions were adequate and the parts all were made correctly and assembled into an attractive, sturdy unit. It is important to fit the panels fully into the brackets so that the unit ends up stable and all the doors fit right. The unit is sturdy and looks attractive. I am very happy with this purchase - excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Redbud

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I am so beyond happy with this purchase. My shoes have never been better organized in my entire life and I have a lot of shoes! Each compartment fits 3 to 4 shoes comfortably (sometimes more). I read the reviews before purchasing and a lot of people said they had some challenges initially putting it together but then it was fine. I love putting furniture together so for me it was very easy. I love that you can configure it anyway you want to fit your space. I’ve had so many people asked me where I got it. I would definitely buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Katie C. Cahnmann

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Directions!!
customer_reviews.text: Product seems self intuitive to put together but the instructions were terribly unclear as to what is a base panel, top panel, etc... that I had to keep scrolling back to the image of the product to try to figure it out!! No clue if it actually works but this directions crap is enough I make me regret purchasing!! Furthermore, there’s pieces missing!! I was supposed to have enough to make 18 cubes and only have enough to make 16!!!!! Terrible. Oh and didn I mention there is no seller contact info?!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! It is way over rated and it is too much money for what you get. The directions that came with it, was not for this specific product. Only received 7 complete sections, which I actually paid for 10 sections. Would not recommend this product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Great storage cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift, but the recipient tells me she loves it and the attractive and space saving advantage of putting it to use. It also arrived in a timely manner and is everything the manufacturer claims.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hall

customer_reviews.title: But the second one is missing pieces like 6 short side dividers
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my wife’s shoes. They were delivered on the same day but at different times. I assembled the first one no problem. But the second one is missing pieces like 6 short side dividers. Hoping they read this and send the 6 sides before I decide to return this order. 2 stars because of the parts shortage.
customer_reviews.author: Guy A Font sr

customer_reviews.title: we find them sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Our second unit, we find them sturdy and convenient. They can be put in different shapes to fit available space. That is very helpful in our small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! The item came missing pieces so i only ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The item came missing pieces so i only have 7 cubes instead of the 10 i paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Two Cubes to complete 18 holes
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but after assembling it, I realized that it was missing pieces for the last two cubes. The info said to contact the comps. I did, but I haven’t heard anything back from them. I have already assembled the whole unit minus the two missing cubes. I paid for 18 holes, not 16. What do I do?
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Not even CLOSE to worth the money, flimsy design, no instructions - DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful that this product would be worth the money. It wasn't even close, and I had pretty low expectations. Flimsy design, no instructions, and parts that break easily- plus, it looks really cheap. I don't usually provide reviews unless something is really good or bad- this product is literally one of the worst I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lebowski

customer_reviews.title: I got about halfway in assembling the shelving which initially ...
customer_reviews.text: I got about halfway in assembling the shelving which initially was very attractive; however I came across pieces that were already torn or broken apart from the threading seem.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H.

customer_reviews.title: It is actually larger than I originally thought it would ...
customer_reviews.text: It is actually larger than I originally thought it would be. It was difficult to begin putting together as there are no written instructions, however, we were able to put it together after working through all of the pieces. One suggestion is to place the organizer on all sides and push together until you hear it click. Solid once it is put together completely.
customer_reviews.author: kelly watson

customer_reviews.title: Assembly and patience required
customer_reviews.text: More like 2.5 Stars. Sadly the instructions were not thorough and made assembly a long and stressful process. Be careful when securing corners as they have a tendency to disconnect when trying to secure another. The decorative doors do not all close and if forced could leave you with a broken piece. See pix. I have the 18 compartment but was too frustrated to go on or put away my shoes. I’m going to need a little time and some wine to take that on.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Oatis

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok. You can only build it as one big unit.
customer_reviews.text: None of my bins close all the way and none of them stay open. I built two separate units and it only made 14 storage bins total. Now I have leftover pieces and nothing to do with them. I contacted the seller the same day I received it to see if I could buy additional pieces separately but have not gotten any response.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe storage. Moderate to easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for shoe storage. The instructions are adequate, if you have some experience putting things together. If not, they are not so complete. It is possible to put these cubes together in a configuration that suits your needs. The price is fair. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doris D.

customer_reviews.title: Putting together is time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Took me forever to build!!! But, a few glasses of wine later (4hours) I was finally able to complete it. Easy to wipe and provides plenty of storage. I do not think the images give it enough justice. I am a size 10 and can fit 2 pairs of shoes in each drawer easily. Boots can be trickier, you will either place them standing up or laying down. If you have to lay down your boot you can only hit one pair. To help maintain the cleanliness of my shoe rack I usually beat and wipe the dirt from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a shoe rack that can be covered up so my dog can’t get into it when she’s alone. This was pretty easy to assemble but the instructions in the packet had the wrong photos so I couldn’t follow it at all and went with my gut/common sense instead. Looks great! Super happy with it. The corners could be a little sturdier but for the price, it’s a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dana R

customer_reviews.title: VERY Disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: VERY Disappointed in this product. The front clear covers do not match up and or close all the way. Not worth the money I spent on them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to assemble in the beginning.
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to build this but once I figure out how each knob was placed, it got easier. Although I did get frustrated at time. Overall, the slots fit 2 pairs of shoes and it is very roomy. My daughter loves it in her closet.
customer_reviews.author: Dilcia

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The only problem is that the directions ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot sturdier than I thought it would be. I love it. The only problem is that the directions that came with it were vague and of no use. Luckily I found a YouTube video that my hubby was able to watch. He is handy so he understood the video. Its a good thing he was here because I would have been lost even with the video.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job organizing!
customer_reviews.text: I have 17 roommates (18 of us total) as we are all flight attendants coming and going. With 18 nooks this was perfect for everyone to hide their shoes by the door and keep the place clean, tidy and organized. I like that it's easy to wipe down and seems pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: GroceryBaggins

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this item to be a bit heavier but it serves its purpose and I love it. Don’t put many pairs of shoes in one cubby though because the weight will bring it down and you don’t want that. If it’s sandals or anything lightweight then that’s fine. I really like the designs and nothing came broken. Once you’re done assembling it, which is very easy, you should press down on the connecters so they all click and same thing with the sides, just push them together. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marlan

customer_reviews.title: 👋🏻
customer_reviews.text: This thing has crap directions! Once you figure it out it’s pretty sturdy but takes forever to put together. Doesn’t move well so put it together where it is going to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Keeps shoes safe
customer_reviews.text: Keeps shoes safe. Assembly was easy and looks nice in the home. Material definitely seems waterproof but is pieced together so there are small spaces water could get through. Love the product, but I do not think the material is worth the price it is being sold for. However, I am happy I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 36 (2 bundles of 18 compartments) and they held over 60 pairs of shoes, boots, booties, and sandals with about 6 cubes left over! I was unable to put all 36 into the closet space but all of my shoes fit and thats all I needed! So happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Altogether it took about 20 mins to put together and product is strong sturdy and it fits perfectly in my closet
customer_reviews.text: Reccomend product. It took me about 10 mins to put together the first cube but once you have the first cube assembled with the fixtures orinintated the way you want it’s a breeze putting it together. Altogether it took about 20 mins to put together and product is strong sturdy and it fits perfectly in my closet. I like that you can customize the size and how many you want.
customer_reviews.author: Zovig

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It stores shoes well, looks nice even if it's not very sturdy. I love how it's easy to open and close individually. It really helped make my entry way look tidy and elegant . Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily. Thought it would be cute in my room ...
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart easily. Thought it would be cute in my room for my shoes but I have expensive furniture and it made my bedroom look cheap. I broke it down into smaller sections and put it in my walk in closet
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Could’ve been made better and stronger
customer_reviews.text: Got mine in December 2019 I kept it stored and I really regretted that I didn’t assemble it until February, I would’ve definitely retuned to the seller due to the very poor construction and sturdiness Shelves and junctions already started to come apart after few days, and there’s no way to put it together properly than take nearly the whole thing apart then reassemble it again •Good design •Lightweight
customer_reviews.author: mohamed amrouch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product really looks nice and a lot sturdier than ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product really looks nice and a lot sturdier than i ever would have thought. It really takes the mess of a pile of kids shoes and stores them nicely without dust settling on the shoes like in standard open shoe racks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisimba Shakir

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, there are better options for less money
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to use this as an organizer in the guest room closet but it's definitely too flimsy and would never hold up. It also looks cheap and toy-like and is not at all what I expected or what the picture portrays. I would never have paid this much for something this useless had I known exactly what I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy, neat and clean!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a person who is obssess with keep everytning organized. This is a great item! I have used it to keep my shoes because I hate see shoes even if they are organized and clean visibly. It's so helpful and versatil!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 star review because I absolutely love this shoe rack, however, I was short 5 of the short side pieces to finish putting together. As a result I was only able to put 7 of the cubes together. So based on that I am giving it only a 2 star review. Is there any way you can send me the additional 5 short side pieces so I can have a complete rack?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. The instructions are a little hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. The instructions are a little hard to figure out but I watched a video a lady made on how to put them together and it was easy. The only complaint I have is 2 pieces were ripped/cracked when I took them our of the box.
customer_reviews.author: kathy bushnell

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe storage!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice product and material! The instructions were not very clear, but we managed to figure out how to put it together! Finished product came out nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kanya Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe container we have a place to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe container we have a place to put my shoes and it hides them well. It was easy once you start putting it together. I had to look up the direction,it only had a couple of picture with no written directions. I would have given it 5 stars if it weren't for bad directions to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Darcelle Abadia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This does not hold up, and is a pain to set up! Save your energy and don’t even bother wasting your time. They barely hold up when you put a shoes in. Prepare to constantly fix when it snaps out.
customer_reviews.author: Mala

customer_reviews.title: Don’t touch
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on the top of my closet but I had to get a piece of wood to make it fit. It’s really wide. And scared to touch too much don’t want it to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Annette Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... someone regarding missing pieces to this order otherwise I love the item just missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come complete cannot find where to talk to someone regarding missing pieces to this order otherwise I love the item just missing pieces
customer_reviews.author: stacy sampson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect functionality
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks, it fits so many shoes, it doesn't look cheap for the price and is easy to assemble! Can't think of anything else to ask for. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review
customer_reviews.text: I am revising my 1st review. After coming apart, I repaired it and now it holds up well. Came apart within a week of using
customer_reviews.author: Tee B.

customer_reviews.title: when I go to put stuff in it then it wobbles and seems like it's trying to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute but it's not made very well , when I go to put stuff in it then it wobbles and seems like it's trying to fall apart
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Shoe lover ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was tired of squeezing my shoes into a over the door shoe holder this holds 2 or 3 pairs of shoes each cube I can fit at least 5 pairs of flat sandals without squeezing them in the doors help keep the dust off the shoes I'll be ordering another soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED WITH MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: IT'S AWFUL TO BEGIN ASSEMBLING YOUR SHOE RACK & THEN REALIZE WHEN ALMOST COMPLETE THAT YOU DON'T HAVE ALL THE PARTS TO COMPLETE IT!!! SELLER SHOULD RECTIFY THE ISSUE WITHOUT HAVING TO DISASSEMBLE & RETURN THE ENTIRE SHOE RACK. VERY DISAPPOINTING!!! JUST SEND THE MISSING PARTS NEEDED TO COMPLETE THE SHOE RACK.
customer_reviews.author: DIMPLES

customer_reviews.title: this shoe storage closet works great and it makes my bedroom very neat with keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: this shoe storage closet works great and it makes my bedroom very neat with keeping many shoes off the floor. The fabric of the cover is also very good. Modeling is also very fashionable and generous. It's really worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Crazydreamer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents. Nice product. Some of the covers don’t fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Goodmom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's purpose had missing pieces I had to wait.
customer_reviews.author: miriam clarke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Pretty sturdy. Easy to assemble after watching assembly video (instructions were a bit complicated for me). I bought to store my toddlers shoes and other miscellaneous items. I can fit 6 pairs per cubby. My daughter wears a size 8. Will for sure purchase again to add on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best storage for shoes
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of shoes , I gave half of the shelves to my teenager daughter for her shoes. Easy access very cute will buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Inspect the doors before you assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality control. Of the 18 doors, 6 were made correctly, 9 had metal grommets where the machine did not fully round them, leaving a rough edge where you insert your finger, 2 had a small tear above the grommet, and 1 had a hole next to the grommet. Pictures attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe organizer, it was a little tedious to put together. But it works, worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Brittnee

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed! I paid for 18 cube and only received ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in missing pieces!!! So disappointed! I paid for 18 cube and only received enough to make 16 cube and some missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: fishgame

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very unstable and falls apart, cannot hold neither shoes nor tools, do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: This rack is so awesome! I've always wanted to have a shoe rack ...
customer_reviews.text: This rack is so awesome! I've always wanted to have a shoe rack that has a cover to hide the shoes and found this. It looks nice in our garage, you wouldn't even know it's a shoe rack.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Get organized
customer_reviews.text: I was overly excited about this purchase and it exceeded my expectations. Easy to put together even without instructions. Material is so durable and sturdy and the design is simple fits more shoes than leads on. So happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andraya

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces; can't get any help.
customer_reviews.text: At least six pieces missing to complete assembly. Can't get Langria to respond to any of my emails. Amazon wants me to file a police report before they'll help. Is this for real?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It was an absolute nightmare to put together... the instructions that came with it were for a different item. Once we got it together it’s actually pretty sturdy, but none of the doors close... not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Rack!
customer_reviews.text: Moved from a house to a townhome and wanted to have my “mudroom” in the garage since that is where I will enter and exit. This shoe rack is fantastic! It holds all of my shoes and looks great! Each section hold 3-4 pair of woman’s size 7.5 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Watch the YouTube video for 18 cube Langria shoe rack.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Running

customer_reviews.text: Directions were unclear and confusing. Took longer than expected to put together because of instructions and diagrams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pannels
customer_reviews.text: I received the products last week but just now has the time to assemble. Installing is a little tricky but pretty easy. My only complaints I missed 6 large panels to build 18 compartments but I can only installed 12. Cannot return does not want to deassembled . How I can get the missing panels?
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but just as I was about to finish I noticed I was missing 3 pieces. So instead of 18 cubes, I only have 16. I'm just missing 2 tops and 1 short side. If someone has a way for me to contact the distributor. Please help me. Other than that, I love it. I just want it completed.
customer_reviews.author: J_Latrice87

customer_reviews.title: It is missing the big pieces of black plastic and also the plastic is very easy to break
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bit difficult to install and put pieces together than I expected and after I finished installing. It is missing the big pieces of black plastic and also the plastic is very easy to break. One of the big black plastic piece broken when I was trying to fix the corner.you can see missing pieces from the picture
customer_reviews.author: janexn

customer_reviews.title: Good storage unit
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble once I got the hang of it. But I had to put a little bit of pressure to make sure everything will stay in place. When I moved it to the location I wanted to be it got loose a little bit. However, I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mirza M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This product was missing about 4 pieces. I wasn’t able to build more than 7 cubes for our shoes. Even though it was easy to put together the instruction and total # of parts was wrong on the list. Low cost product.
customer_reviews.author: Feroza Ejaz

customer_reviews.title: assembly is easy (and kind of fun)
customer_reviews.text: Each section is spacious, assembly is easy (and kind of fun), the material is high quality and sturdy, and the look of the product is really nice. I am very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but fell apart when moved. Unable to use again. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes a lot of stuff in more than the container. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Should have waited.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to assemble but not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: K.D. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and organized!
customer_reviews.text: Love this show storage!!! Definitely a great buy. I split it between my daughter and I so we both have 9 cubes and how great it is for their to be no shoes scattered around the floor! 😁 Not to mention that it's really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Rios

customer_reviews.title: This worked perfectly for me. I am using it ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for me. I am using it for my daughter's shoes. I can fit 2 to 3 pairs of shoes in one bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 18. I only received 15 full units ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 18. I only received 15 full units. Aggravating when you don’t get what you pay for. And they’re cheaply made. Not worth the 70 bucks I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Bradford

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only came with 17 cubes and several we're broken and damaged
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Do not use the directions that come with delivery.  Use directions on Amazon site
customer_reviews.text: Do not use the directions that come with delivery. Use pictures/directions on Amazon site. I gave the directions that came with the package to my housekeeper and how she tried to put it together kept falling apart so as I got back on here to request a refund and write a bad review, I saw how it was actually supposed to be put together and it is quite different than the paper sent. Save yourselves time and frustration and use Amazon directions/pictures. Once this is put together correctly, it is great! I wear a size 6 shoe and I can fit 3 pairs in each cubby.
customer_reviews.author: TheNonPerfectMom

customer_reviews.title: came with extra pieces
customer_reviews.text: instructions are not helpful. we ended up with extra pieces. it seems like a temporary solution to clutter.
customer_reviews.author: fa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have it for a few month. We have almost 40 pairs of shoes in it. So happy
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a shoe rack that will cover our shoes from dust and rain and found this (I'm Asian and no shoes are allowed inside the house LOL)! Super easy to assemble. Only downside is it does not look sturdy. But we'll see!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for shoe storage, only took me less than 20 minutes to assemble. :)
customer_reviews.author: nickylou727

customer_reviews.title: I like the clean look
customer_reviews.text: I like the clean look. Will be ordering more. Mine fit 3pairs of shoes per cube. I wear size 7.
customer_reviews.author: L&M

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe compartment for out side. This LANGRIA 10-Cube DIY Shoe Rack was perfect. Also, protect the shoes from sun light and the outside dust. Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Make sure before buying
customer_reviews.text: The product itself it’s okay could be better. It wasn’t easy to assemble the instructions were not clear so it took a while. It’s way to expensive for something that kept falling down. I wasn’t impressed with the product as much.
customer_reviews.author: Yorleny Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I received the item and it was missing pieces. I was only able to assemble 16 out of 18 drawers because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Zack B

customer_reviews.title: Big than I thought,  cuter than expected
customer_reviews.text: A bit confusing at first to snap together, but after you get a flow it goes together quickly, looks great in our office...using for storage
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fits a lot of shoes! My shoe boxes fit too. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ana H

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: All my shoes have been sitting in boxes for lack of space in my room and organization, it was easy to snap together although a little time consuming but that's unavoidable. Once put together each compartment had space for many shoes much roomier than I had thought, material is sturdy and easy to wipe clean, design is kinda cute too, not to mention this company was just so incredibly nice, I emailed them asking if I could buy a few spare parts so I could set it up totally vertical and they happily sent them no problem and it arrived quickly too, 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: I had fun assemble it. Just one thing is that it can't be changed to different settings to have 18 compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Ddasan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality connector
customer_reviews.text: Overall it looks sleek. But when it comes to the details...look at crack on the plastic connector. I mean I was expecting a better shoe rack at this price. Sorta disappointing but what else you can say. After all It’s plastic. Or cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Somack

customer_reviews.title: You can add on or decrease anytime. Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Depending on what kind of shoes, you can put more than 36 pairs in it.
customer_reviews.author: toni conley

customer_reviews.title: Decent product!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy assemble, once you get the hang of it. Lol Satisfied with the durability, material and look overall of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes part of the shelf would break, but not damage. You can reinstall it.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Lo

customer_reviews.title: Need better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Need better instructions. Instructions that come with product does not give good direction on how to put it together. Product seems sturdy once together and in place. Holds several pairs of shoes/boots.
customer_reviews.author: sue h.

customer_reviews.title: L
customer_reviews.text: The instructions included are not for the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Geckles

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even stay together, very difficult to put together. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Easy company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product 5 stars even though they didn’t send the correct item. But, they fixed the issue and the half of the product I received was nicely built, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mehgen

product_meta.title: LANGRIA 18-Cube DIY Shoe Rack, Storage Drawer Unit Multi Use Modular Organizer Plastic Cabinet with Doors, Black and White Curly Pattern
feature_bullets: RESISTANT PANELS: made of PP plastic with steel frames, these panels are eco-friendly, toxic-free and durable, holding up to 13 lbs. /cube; the frosted translucent design cheers up the style of the cabinet with a black and white curly pattern;

FUNCTIONAL STORAGE SPACE: 18 rectangular cubbies to store all your shoes in a reduced space; the cubbies can be build up together or separately, offering customizable solutions to fit in different spaces

EASY TO PUT TOGETHER: multi-angled plastic connectors are included to assemble your modular cabinet; it is recommended to use a pair of gloves to protect the hands from getting scratched or harmed while attaching the panels with the connectors

MULTI PURPOSE CABINET: each of the cubbies can store 2 pairs of shoes with a total capacity of 36 pairs of shoes; the modular closet can be used to store not only shoes but clothes, accessories, bedding and lining, CDs and DVDs, toys, cables.

CONNECTORS & MAINTENANCE: the connectors are made of sturdy ABS to securely join the panels; the unit is waterproofed and dust-resistant; panels are easy to clean with a damp cloth; doors feature hole handles for easy opening as well as air flow; new direction, any question while put it together, please feel free to contact us

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars518 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
